columns.name: CYCLE_ID
columns.description: Cycle ID (ICF .1) of the cycle that this comment belongs to.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COMMENT_DATE
columns.description: The cycle date that this comment was added to.

columns.name: COMMENT_PAT_ID
columns.description: Stores the EPT ID of the patient that the comment is on. (Multiple patients can be linked to a single ICF)

columns.name: COMMENT_VALUE
columns.description: Stores the value of the saved comment. Comments will be limited to a maximum of 500 characters.

columns.name: COMMENT_USER_ID
columns.description: EMP ID of the provider that added/updated the comment.

columns.name: COMMENT_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: COMMENT_INST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Instant in which the comment was added/updated
